scripts.docker:build:api: docker build --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/api/package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-api -f apps/api/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build:web: docker build --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/web/package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-web -f apps/web/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build:web:dev: docker build --target development --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/web/package.json').version")-dev --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-web:dev -f apps/web/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build:web:prod: docker build --target production --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/web/package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-web:prod -f apps/web/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:api && npm run docker:build:web
scripts.docker:build:versioned: npm run docker:build:api:versioned && npm run docker:build:web:versioned
scripts.docker:build:api:versioned: docker build --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/api/package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-api:$(node -p "require('./apps/api/package.json').version") -t playaplan-api:latest -f apps/api/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build:web:versioned: docker build --build-arg IMAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./apps/web/package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') -t playaplan-web:$(node -p "require('./apps/web/package.json').version") -t playaplan-web:latest -f apps/web/Dockerfile .
